name: A Little Home
description:
Mike is a tiny person living in an abandoned, regular-sized person's house with his sick daughter, Milly. Help gather enough mechanical parts to build an escape vehicle while trying to make sure Milly's condition doesn't get worse.

(I made this game as part of my studies to learn more about Unity. This is my first game ever so I know it's not the greatest but any feedback is still helpful.)

Feel free to stop by our Discord Server!

  • Explore of a huge map
  • Ward off terrifying spiders
  • Zip around with a grappling hook
  • 4GB Ram
  • 2GB VRAM
  • 2.5 GHz
  • 800 MB Storage Space
